web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.description: From static websites to dynamic applications, I offer comprehensive web development services tailored to your needs.
list: Front-end Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js
Content Management System Integration: WordPress, OpenCart

backend_development.title: Backend Development
backend_development.description: I provide high-performance, scalable backend development services, from simple APIs to complex architectures.
list: Server-side Languages: PHP, Node.js, Java, Python
Database Management: MySQL, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server

full_stack_solutions.title: Full-Stack Solutions
full_stack_solutions.description: Leveraging both front-end and back-end skills, I provide end-to-end solutions to ensure smooth project completion from design to deployment.

go_training.title: Go Training
go_training.description: As an experienced Go player and referee, I offer Go training sessions tailored to various skill levels.
list: Personalized training sessions for beginners to advanced players
Game reviews, strategy, and technique improvement
Flexible scheduling for online or in-person lessons
go_training.closing: Whether you're looking to start learning or improve your game, I can guide you with tailored lessons and insights. Contact me to schedule a training session!

web_development.title: 网页开发
web_development.description: 从静态网站到动态应用，我提供全面的网页开发服务，满足您的各种需求。
list: 用户体验优化与界面设计

backend_development.title: 后端开发
backend_development.description: 我提供高性能、可扩展的后端开发服务，从简单的API到复杂的架构。
list: 用户身份验证与授权管理

full_stack_solutions.title: 全栈开发解决方案
full_stack_solutions.description: 结合前端和后端开发技能，我提供端到端的解决方案，确保项目从设计到部署的顺利完成。
list: 完整的项目生命周期支持
安全性提升与漏洞修复
实时数据和消息传递系统

go_training.title: 围棋培训
go_training.description: 作为一名有经验的围棋玩家和裁判员，我提供适合各个水平的围棋培训课程。
list: 个性化的培训课程，适合初学者到高级玩家
对局复盘、战略和技巧提升
在线或面对面灵活安排课程
go_training.closing: 无论您是想开始学习还是提升您的水平，我都可以通过量身定制的课程和见解来指导您。欢迎联系我预约课程！
